videos.introTitle: Add and fact check a new video
videos.intro: CaptainFact is a collaborative fact-checking tool for YouTube videos. People help each others to verify informations in this way: video is added on the websitec statements are extracted from the video, then fact-checkers confirm or refute the statements. All CaptainFact's extension users will see our verifications directly on YouTube videos.
videos.intro2: You can add a new video (if you are a member with at least {{requiredPoints}} reputation pts) or you can contact us:
videos.publicDescription: Public videos are listed on videos page and in browser extension.
videos.unlistedDescription: Unlisted videos will not be listed on the "videos" page, nor in the browser extension. Use them to work on a content that you don't want to bring forward on the platform.
videos.supportedPlatforms: Currently supported platforms are YouTube and Facebook.
videos.adviceTitle: Which video is worth being added?
videos.advice1: Preferably, you are encouraged to add videos:
videos.adviceBulletPoint1: from which you will extract and / or verify statements;
videos.adviceBulletPoint3: that include approximations or incomplete elements;
videos.adviceBulletPoint4: that comprise fallacious, misleading or wrong arguments.

speakerpage.info1: CaptainFact are a fact-checking platform for YouTube video
speakerpage.info2: Speaker's statements can be confirm or refute by CaptainFact's members. All verifications are displayed during the video, if you have installed our browser extension.
